title: Short Mystery Story Collection Vol. 003
creator: Various
description: LibriVox recording of Short Mystery Story Collection Vol. 003 by Various LibriVox’s Short Mystery Story Collection 003: a collection of 10 short works of mysterious fiction in the public domain read by a group of LibriVox members. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: short stories; audiobooks; mystery; fiction; librivox
